name: Counter Shoot Trigger Fist - 2016
description:
Counter Shoot Trigger Fist - 2016

Send your units to the battlefield and take over enemy bases with a simple tap of your finger!
Use the war Attack, along with other unique special attacks to turn the tide in battle, and the goddess of victory will smile upon you!!
Unforgettable battles against real opponents in equipped tanks.

Face your enemy in the battlefield and feel the combat power of your tank.

• Real-time Battle
• Realistic Physics
• Real opponents
• Various upgrade modules
• Lots of camouflage and decal types
• Lots of world arenas

It's real metal force.....
52dba80b71
